DOC.detailed_description: Patients - Symptomatic patient significant stenosis ( diameter stenosis > 75 % significant FFR ) native coronary vessel saphenous vein aortocoronary bypass graft . - All patient aspirin ( 100 mg/day ) receive 10,000 I.U . heparin intravenously . - Coronary angiography perform via femoral approach . - Full informed consent obtain patient participate study . Stenosis severity/Plaque composition - Quantification stenosis severity perform use off-line caliper measurement ( QCA-MEDIS , Leiden , NL ) . - Intravascular imaging analysis stent implantation characterize plaque morphology : 1 . IVUS ( Eagle-EyeTM 20 MHz catheter R-100 pullback device , Volcano Corporation , Rancho Cordova , CA , USA ) 2 . OCT ( St. Jude Medical Lightlab C7 Dragonfly Imaging Catheter ) 3 . NIRS ( InfraReDx TVC Insight catheter ) Interventional procedure Distal balloon occlusion device : - TriAktiv SVG/3.5-FX-catheter ; Kensey Nash , Exton , USA - GuardWire Temporary Occlusion & Aspiration System ; Medtronic Inc. , Minneapolis , MN USA Implantation balloon-expandable stent use balloon pressure 14 18 atm balloon-to-vessel diameter ratio 1:1 . Coronary arterial blood coronary aspirate - Coronary arterial blood take distal lesion stent implantation coronary aspirate blood obtain stent implantation ( Heparin- EDTA- Monovettes , SARSTEDT AG & Co , Nümbrecht , Germany ) . - Ex vivo coronary aspirate blood filter mesh filter pore 40 μm diameter . - Immediately centrifugation filter coronary arterial aspirate blood ( 800g , 10 min , 4°C ) . - Particulate debris coronary arterial aspirate plasma quickly freeze liquid nitrogen store -80°C use .
